title: Jackie King
description: I've been lucky enough to travel the world, but my favourite purchase would have to be my two gorgeous dogs Barley and Suki, a springer spaniel and a Dogue de Bordeaux.

title: Brian Caswell
description: Being able to give my family financial security and help people in our local community is such a fantastic feeling I can’t even put it into words!

title: Emma Wildin
description: We stayed at the Disneyland Hotel earlier this year, which was like a dream. I’ve also been able to indulge in my favourite guilty pleasure – shopping!

title: Mark Brudenell
description: We used a majority of our winnings to set up our business; however we also bought ourselves a great home as well as some lovely cars – a Range Rover Sport and an Audi A5.

title: Karen Child
description: I now have a lovely four-bedroom home of my own. I have met so many people and had the chance to get involved with lots of interesting projects.

title: Malcolm Wilkins
description: Family came first for me so I made sure my sister and brother were settled before I treated myself. I love travelling and winning has enabled me to see so much of the world.

title: Matt Myles
description: I’ve loved travelling the world and sharing my win with my family and friends – it has just been the most amazing experience.

title: Deana Sampson
description: Having come from very humble beginnings, I knew I had to make the money work for me and my family. I’ve made some good investments and am now a lady of leisure.

title: Niki Otterburn
description: I grew up with horses but after an accident I become a fitness instructor. The lottery win has given me a second chance to follow my dream. I spend every day outside whatever the weather and love every minute.

title: Eloise Heard
description: My fiancé David and I have taken our time spending the money on the ‘big things’ in life, like our home and wedding. We’re both working hard to get our businesses going but knowing we have financial security at such a young age is phenomenal!

title: Gareth Bull
description: Since winning we’ve been able to take our foot off the pedal a bit. We also believe it’s important to give something back and are involved with various charities as well as taking an active part in our local community.

title: Sarah Cockings
description: As well as some of the more fun things I’ve bought, I’m also really lucky to be able to be a stay at home mum as that is a real luxury these days.

title: Sharon Mather
description: Sharing the win has been the best experience. It was amazing to be able to take my husband Nigel’s mum and dad away on their first holiday abroad in 20 years and we’ve been able to make family members mortgage free.

title: Dean Hardman
description: I have always enjoyed following many sports and have had the chance to sponsor a number of local boxers and darts players, as well as Bury FC.

title: Alex Dyer
description: I absolutely love my home in Spain, it’s a bit like The Good Life only with less rain. We grow our own food and I have my own horse so I can go riding on the beach whenever I want.

title: Dean Allen
description: I’ve flown a jet plane in the Florida Keys, gone ice racing in Finland and skydived in Devon. But the most rewarding part has been being able to help out my family and support charities close to my heart.

title: Thea Bristow
description: We've been able to make sure our three children and their children are financially secure as well as support great causes like 'The Make a Wish Foundation'.

title: Jane Cunningham
description: The win enabled me to move into a lovely family home and I’ve been able to get my daughter on the property ladder. I’m able to indulge in lovely shoes too!

title: Roy Gibney
description: When I won I enjoyed all the luxuries you would expect of a lottery winner – even featuring my winning numbers on the bottom of my swimming pool. Nowadays I don't indulge quite as much but still enjoy the carefree life winning has given me, and I split my time between my villa in Cyprus and Britain.

title: Elaine Thompson
description: We’ve worked and played hard over the past 19 years. Life has calmed down now but we still enjoy the odd trappings of the lottery lifestyle – we are off to Las Vegas again next week!
